message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. It's a fair start.
Let's make a deal, Alice. I'll take a bit more, you take a bit less. Time is money, after all.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's meet in the middle. We both still get a decent amount, and we can move on.
Alice, this offer is more than fair considering the time pressure.  I'm willing to be reasonable, but I need you to meet me halfway.
Bob, we're running out of time.  I'm willing to give you a bit more, but we need to close this deal.  Let's make this happen.
